thread.title: Cintron World and Cintron Pink Polo 2015
thread.title_full: Cintron World and Cintron Pink Polo 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Cintron World and Cintron Pink Polo 2015
text:
Cintron World, Inc
NEW YORK , Oct. 16, Cintron World, an international beverage company with a line of flavored energy drinks Cintron Premium Energy, is proud to announce their continued involvement as headline sponsor of the prestigious Cintron Pink Polo event, in support of breast cancer awareness, treatment, and research, to be held at Val de Vie Estate in South Africa on November 7 th 2015.
Cintron World is an "aspirational" luxury lifestyle brand that offers premium beverages with quality ingredients and great taste. Cintron Premium Energy drinks come in three flavors: Original, Cranberry, and Pineapple, and are crafted from natural mineral water, real fruit juice and contains no artificial coloring or chemical preservatives. At Cintron World, we build brands that represent an up-scale lifestyle, which encourages people to look good and feel great by living a fashionable, productive, and healthy lifestyle. We also believe in building community around these brand attributes, and our Cintron Polo Club is a leading international community of like-minded people that enjoy the lifestyle of Cintron and the awesome game of polo. Our Cintron Polo Club members will be enjoying special benefits as they partake in Cintron Pink Polo with us this year!
As the start of their polo season, Val de Vie Estate will host Cintron Pink Polo on November 7 th and will offer an exquisite VIP experience with a unique blend of entertainment, fashion and polo action. Guests will also have the opportunity to taste and experience the distinctiveness of Cintron Premium Energy drinks: tantalizing flavors, delicious cocktails, and the luxury lifestyle of the brand, all for a great cause. This year funds from the event will go to Reach for Recovery , a non-profit organization that provides emotional care and practical support to breast cancer patients and their families.
Cintron World also has a long-term commitment to breast cancer awareness, treatment and research through a digital campaign called Cintron Selfies for Survivors . Every time a Cintron customer uploads a "selfie" to social media using #CintronSelfie, Cintron World donates $1 in benefit of breast cancer. Funds donated on a monthly-basis benefit the Pink Drive in South Africa and other international non-profit organizations that assist women and families in their fight against breast cancer.
Cintron World is more than just a premium beverage brand; it's a lifestyle. And that's why Cintron is very pleased to host our Cintron Polo Club members and all our prestigious guests during Cintron Pink Polo at the Val de Vie Estate, in benefit of breast cancer awareness. #CintronPinkPolo
Cintron World, Inc
